articles.description: The former Arsenal midfielder, who left West Ham earlier this season, has been training with the Cherries in recent weeks and has impressed manager Jason Tindall with his fitness.
articles.content:
Bournemouth have agreed a deal to re-sign free agent Jack Wilshere after a successful period training with the Championship side.
The former Arsenal midfielder, who left West Ham earlier this season… [+2181 chars]

articles.author: Darren Wells
articles.title: Jose Mourinho 'losing patience' with Gareth Bale amid hostile video footage - Mirror Online
articles.description: Bale has been used sparingly by his manager since his return to Tottenham and it seems Mourinho has little intention of playing him more often unless he sees significant changes
articles.content:
Jose Mourinho is reportedly running out of patience with Gareth Bale and was seen complaining about the winger on recent video footage broadcast by Tottenham.
